Tool

NameLake Flood
ID16
AuthorVolker Wichmann (c) 2005-2010
Specificationgrid

Description

This module can be used to flood a digital elevation model from seed points. Seed points have to be coded either with local water depth or absolute water level.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
DEM Grid (input)ELEVdigital elevation model
Seeds Grid (input)SEEDSseed cells coded with local water depth or absolute water level, all other cells NoData
Output
LakeGrid (output)OUTDEPTHextent of lake, coded with water depth
SurfaceGrid (output)OUTLEVELFlooded digital elevation model
Options
Absolute Water LevelsBooleanLEVELcheck this in case seed cells are coded with absolute water levelDefault: 0
